subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: With a 46th career pole, Hamilton moved to third place on Formula One’s all-time leaderboard, with only Michael Schumacher (68) and Ayrton Senna (65) ahead of him.
snippet: With a 46th career pole, Hamilton moved to third place on Formula One’s all-time leaderboard, with only Michael Schumacher (68) and Ayrton Senna (65) ahead of him.
